greeting.name: Vinicius Diniz
greeting.description: I served as a Marine Corps Rifleman for over seven years, during which I was awarded five medals and a Certificate of Honor for Merit, reflecting my commitment and excellence in service.
greeting.description2: I have a degree in Information Systems and I am currently finishing a postgraduate program in Cybersecurity. I have experience in IT infrastructure. Currently, I am specializing in Back-End Development with Java and Spring Boot, after completing a course at SENAI Maracan√£, while improving my Front-End skills, focusing on the Angular framework, among others.
greeting.description3: I am passionate about video games, which drives me to take a detailed and creative approach to software development. I am always looking for new challenges that allow me to expand my knowledge and contribute to innovative projects.
